item.description:
Ok so now that the fall is setting in its time to get back out there for a rematch of last winters bowling night.

This time lets go out to Pilgrim Lanes in Haverhill, they have plenty of lanes, arcade games and they serve beer & wine ..that could be interesting

They currently have a deal going on, its $30.00 per lane for 2 hours with free shoe rental or $3.50 per game per person, plus $2.00 for shoe rental.

So come on down to Pilgrim and have a good ole fun Saturday Night.

Hope to see you at the alleys.

If you get lost or are running late, please call the meetup phone at 978-304-2811.

Donna & Janet
item.name: Bowling Anyone???????????
